# Stage 01 - Infra Setup & Kubernetes Cluster Provisioning

This stage is responsible for setting up the infrastructure and provisioning the Kubernetes cluster.

## Infrastructure Setup

### VPC

The VPC is created with the following components:

- VPC
- Subnets
- Internet Gateway
- Route Tables
- Security Groups

### EKS Cluster Provisioning

The Kubernetes cluster provisioning includes the following components:
